import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './Contact.scss' import Animation from '../Animation/Animation' import Loader from 'react-loaders' const Contact = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const array = ['C', 'o', 'n', 't', 'a', 'c', 't', ' ', 'm', 'e'] useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) }, []) return ( <>
